${ModID}:PaceChaser.NAME: Pace Chaser
${ModID}:PaceChaser.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Gain Block equal to !M! times its cost. NL (X-cost and Unplayable count as 1.)
${ModID}:PaceChaser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Gain Block equal to !M! times its cost. NL (X-cost, 0-cost, and Unplayable count as 1.)

${ModID}:FrontRunner.NAME: Front Runner
${ModID}:FrontRunner.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Deal !D! damage X times, where X is the drawn card's cost. NL (X-cost and Unplayable count as 1.)
${ModID}:FrontRunner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Deal !D! damage X times, where X is the drawn card's cost. NL (X-cost, 0-cost, and Unplayable count as 1.)

${ModID}:LateSurger.NAME: Late Surger
${ModID}:LateSurger.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E] NL and !${ModID}:m2! Vigor.
${ModID}:LateSurger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E] [E] NL and !${ModID}:m2! Vigor.

${ModID}:EndCloser.NAME: End Closer
${ModID}:EndCloser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to !M! random enemies. End your turn.

${ModID}:FreshRyegrass.NAME: Fresh Ryegrass
${ModID}:FreshRyegrass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When exhausted, shuffle a copy with !M! more Block into your draw pile.

${ModID}:MoodSwing.NAME: Mood Swing
${ModID}:MoodSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Worsen umapyoi:Mood by !${ModID}:m2! rank.

${ModID}:ElatedCoverage.NAME: Elated Coverage
${ModID}:ElatedCoverage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Improve umapyoi:Mood by !M! rank.

${ModID}:VictoriaPorPlancha.NAME: Victoria por Plancha
${ModID}:VictoriaPorPlancha.DESCRIPTION: Choose to add a *Bash, *Clothesline, or *Uppercut with Exhaust and Ethereal to your hand. NL It costs 0 to play this turn.
${ModID}:VictoriaPorPlancha.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose to add a *Bash+, *Clothesline+, or *Uppercut+ with Exhaust and Ethereal to your hand. NL It costs 0 to play this turn.

${ModID}:IntroductionToPhysiology.NAME: Introduction to Physiology
${ModID}:IntroductionToPhysiology.DESCRIPTION: Choose to add an *Evolve, *Fire *Breathing, or *Noxious *Fumes to your hand. NL It costs 0 to play this turn. Exhaust.

${ModID}:LetsPumpIron.NAME: Let's Pump Some Iron!
${ModID}:LetsPumpIron.DESCRIPTION: Choose to add an *Inflame, *Dark *Embrace, or *Feel *No *Pain to your hand. NL It costs 0 to play this turn. Exhaust.

${ModID}:FickleMaiden.NAME: Fickle Maiden
${ModID}:FickleMaiden.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust. NL Return this card from the Exhaust pile whenever your umapyoi:Mood changes.

${ModID}:Acupuncture.NAME: Acupuncture
${ModID}:Acupuncture.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity X times. Shuffle X random Status cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FirstRateStrike.NAME: First-Rate Strike
${ModID}:FirstRateStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Vigor equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:LongShotStar.NAME: Long Shot Star
${ModID}:LongShotStar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If 3 or less cards were played this turn, this deals double damage.
${ModID}:LongShotStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If 3 or less cards were played this turn, this deals triple damage.

${ModID}:GolshiKick.NAME: Golshi Kick
${ModID}:GolshiKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If !M! or more cards were played this turn, gain [E] and draw !${ModID}:m2! card(s).

${ModID}:LateStartStatus.NAME: Late Start
${ModID}:LateStartStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When exhausted, gain 1 *Draw *Reduction.

${ModID}:NightOwlStatus.NAME: Night Owl
${ModID}:NightOwlStatus.DESCRIPTION: Retain. When retained, a random card in your hand costs 1 more [E] to play this combat. Exhaust.

${ModID}:RushedStatus.NAME: Rushed
${ModID}:RushedStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. Whenever this card is drawn, lose [E] and draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:SlackerStatus.NAME: Slacker
${ModID}:SlackerStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. Whenever this card is drawn, gain [E], worsen your umapyoi:Mood by 1 rank, and lose 1 Strength.

${ModID}:SlowMetabolismStatus.NAME: Slow Metabolism
${ModID}:SlowMetabolismStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. While this card is in your hand, you cannot gain Block.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
